Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.EXPLANATION: Measures the achievement of strategic objectives set for the training programs.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.FORMULA: (Number of Strategic Objectives Achieved / Total Number of Strategic Objectives) * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.KPIS: Alignment of operational plans with strategic goals
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.EXPLANATION: Measures how well operational plans align with strategic goals.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.FORMULA: (Number of Operational Plans Aligned with Strategic Goals / Total Number of Operational Plans) * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.EXPLANATION: Measures the progress in implementing strategic plans.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.FORMULA: (Current Status of Strategic Plan Implementation / Total Plan Scope) * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.EXPLANATION: Measures stakeholder satisfaction with the strategic direction of the organization.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.FORMULA: Average Rating of Stakeholder Satisfaction with Strategic Direction

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.KPIS: Flexibility and adaptability of strategic plan
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.EXPLANATION: Measures the ability of the strategic plan to adapt to changes.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.FORMULA: (Number of Strategic Adjustments Made / Total Number of Strategic Challenges Encountered) * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of communication about the strategic plan.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.FORMULA: (Number of Effective Communications / Total Number of Communications Sent) * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.KPIS: Market share growth compared to strategic targets
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.EXPLANATION: Measures market share growth against strategic targets.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.FORMULA: (Actual Market Share Growth - Target Market Share Growth) / Target Market Share Growth * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.EXPLANATION: Measures financial performance against strategic targets.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Strategic P.FORMULA: (Actual Financial Performance - Target Financial Performance) / Target Financial Performance * 100
